plot: Set in the dungeons of a futuristic rehabilitation center, Gravel must confront his superior officer, Mr. Cod, in order to save his close friend Robbie from becoming reprogrammed.
title: Mongrel's Creed
plot_es: Set in the dungeons of a futuristic rehabilitation center, Gravel must confront his superior officer, Mr. Cod, in order to save his close friend Robbie from becoming reprogrammed.
plot_en: Set in the dungeons of a futuristic rehabilitation center, Gravel must confront his superior officer, Mr. Cod, in order to save his close friend Robbie from becoming reprogrammed.
